title: Taliyah Fanart ^_^
body: Taliyah seems so badass so far! ^^ thought i have to do a little fanart^^

replies.body: This makes me so happy. So awesome!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot ShadowStorm,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=6YUhFapA,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-05-03T18:47:36.979+0000)
>
> This makes me so happy. So awesome!

Thank youu!! ^^ really glad to hear that ^^ she looks amazing and i especially love her Ulti , so badass! can't wait to try her.
Missed the detail about the sleeves though lol
By fan art I was expecting r34. Left disappointed, but also relieved.

This is awesome! You have a gift! I love the atmosphere you created with the swirling sand in the background and the gradient style of your drawing :D

10/10 please draw more.

> [{quoted}](name=TallyZrg,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=6YUhFapA,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-05-03T17:07:56.230+0000)
>
> This is awesome! You have a gift! I love the atmosphere you created with the swirling sand in the background and the gradient style of your drawing :D
> 
> 10/10 please draw more.

Thank you so much ^^ certainly yep ^^ i think i'll do another fanart for her next  then jump to another champion again ^^

I love it, great work!
I already think about getting a
OTP-Taliyah, i love her set so far. xD



> [{quoted}](name=WhiteLeyth,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=6YUhFapA,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-05-04T06:54:22.043+0000)
>
> Thank you so much ^^ certainly yep ^^ i think i'll do another fanart for her next  then jump to another champion again ^^

Can you make the next one about her casting a E-W-Combo or somthing like that? Would be awesome ahah. :D

first time i saw daliah i remembered journey 
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/journeygame/images/f/fb/Journey_TheTraveler.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/270?cb=20130818222012
Champion has barely been revealed, already fanart, way to get ahead of the game there bro! Nice art btw :p may have to use it as screensaver {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

You drew this? You sure it isn't her splash? :3

Great work!

> [{quoted}](name=MrBuffington,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=6YUhFapA,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-03T14:22:52.652+0000)
>
> You drew this? You sure it isn't her splash? :3
> 
> Great work!

haha thank you! ^^ ah not good enough to qualify as a splash it was a quick thing ^^
Beautiful work! Thank you for sharing. ^_^
{{champion:202}} Perfection isn't good enough!
put this on deviantart so I can fave it! :D

Hi! I'va just seen it and I think this is amazing! She looks so similar to her skins and just wow! U made an amazing job! Congrats! Btw. Could you do another fanart of her with her using her Q ability? I'd look so awesome! :P
Great ;D
That was really friggen fast o-o

You should create a skin for Taliyah, she seems like a tribal type character so I would imagine her being the ruler of the tribe. Tribal Chief Taliyah, with a floating ROCK crown, and armor of earth or something.
awesome
I love the texture on the picture! :D

> [{quoted}](name=Rescued,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=6YUhFapA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-03T12:48:27.137+0000)
>
> I love the texture on the picture! :D

thank you !^^
Well done
This is really good!
Looks amazing! <3
Well, fuck, now I gotta main her. MASTERY 7 TOPH

God what an awesome art piece. Fine work!!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
It's so pretty! I love her hair
Love it.
That looks amazing <3
Wow I love this, I wish I could draw like this xD
Face doesn't look right. Can't see her massive wall-like eyebrows.

> [{quoted}](name=Necro Heleon,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=6YUhFapA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-03T12:44:46.546+0000)
>
> Face doesn't look right. Can't see her massive wall-like eyebrows.

upvoted because it made me laugh.  Let those who are triggered rage, thanks for the smile haha
She surfs on walls. I want to surf on her eyebrows.

> [{quoted}](name=Necro Heleon,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=6YUhFapA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-03T12:44:46.546+0000)
>
> Face doesn't look right. Can't see her massive wall-like eyebrows.

I lol'd.

> [{quoted}](name=Necro Heleon,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=6YUhFapA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-03T12:44:46.546+0000)
>
> Face doesn't look right. Can't see her massive wall-like eyebrows.

haha yeah toned them down a little bit lol, but i think it was a good choice for them to  give her those eyebrows,  the face in general  not the prettiest but suites the character i think, I'm guessing the main reason is for more variation of female faces in the game.
